it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.observe

Class ObserveTransactionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.observe.ObserveTransactionClient

  • public class ObserveTransactionClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A CoAP observe client is a CoAP client that is interested in having a current representation of the resource at any given time. According to the well-known observer design pattern, an observer is a component that register at a specific known provider called the "subject" that they are interested in being notified whenever the subject undergoes a change in state.

    It implements the observer model according to the RFC 7641 "Observing Resources in CoAP".
